title: Grilled Monster Cheese Bats with Tomato Soup

instructions.1: Prepare soup as directed on can.
instructions.2: Meanwhile, spread butter evenly on one side of each bread slice. Place 2 bread slices, buttered sides down, in 12-inch skillet or on griddle. Top each with 2 slices cheese. Top with remaining bread, buttered sides up. Cook over medium heat about 5 minutes, turning once, until bread is golden brown and cheese is melted. Remove to cutting board.
instructions.3: Use 4-inch bat-shaped cookie cutter or sharp knife to cut shape from sandwiches. Cut trimmings into croutons.
instructions.4: Spoon soup into serving bowls and top with grilled cheese croutons. Serve sandwich bats on the side.

questions.question: In Step 4, is the soup from Step 1 being used?
Is soup from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is shape from Step 3 still available in Step 4?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to spoon the soup in Step 4?
Can we spread (Step 2) and spoon (Step 4) at the same time?
